Name: Martinez (Orange)
Ingredients: 2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Stir well as dilution helps to tame this old-school classic in which bitter orange predominates.
Nutrition: One serving of Martinez (Orange) contains 179 calories
